leaded very company wide improvements, training systems, production managment

1) Work experience — for each job (up to 5) give: Job title; Company; Location; Start–End dates; up to 4 bullet achievements/responsibilities (short sentences). Example: "Senior Developer; Acme SA; Geneva, CH; Jan 2020–Dec 2023; Led migration to microservices; Reduced API latency by 35%."

2) Education — for each degree (up to 3) give: Degree/qualification; Institution; Location; Dates; any honours or relevant details (optional).

1) Work experience — please list up to 5 roles (company, job title, start–end dates, location) and up to 4 bullet points per role. If you prefer, give a 1–2 line brief per role and I’ll expand into bullets.

2) Education — list up to 3 entries (degree,

2) Education — please list up to 3 entries: degree, institution, start–end dates (or graduation year), location, and any honors or relevant coursework.

3) Optional extras — do you want a short professional summary (I can draft one), and please list up to 8 key skills (IT/AI and other), up to 5 languages, and any certifications.

4) Links & final options — any URLs to include (LinkedIn, GitHub, portfolio), and do you want a photo on the CV?
